item.title: Android OpenGLES learning-draw a color
item.description: We know that the screen displays content by emitting RGB lamp beads one by one, and the brightness of the lamp beads is determined by a memory area. By writing data to this memory area, we can observe the data display effect on the screen. This is a complex and flexible job. In order to facilitate this work, the pioneers developed the OpenGL standard, and our story will start from here.
